title: ICLR 2018 Conference Acceptance Decision
comment:
All of the reviewers agree that the experimental results are promising and the proposed activation function enables a decent degree of quantization. However, the main concern with the approach is its limited novelty compared to previous work on clipped activation functions.

minor comments:
- Even though PACT is very similar to Relu, the names are very different.
- Please include a plot showing the proposed activation function as well.
